actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Community Mental Health Centers Act to extend for 1 fiscal year the programs of assistance under that act.

summary.text: Extends the programs of assistance under the Community Mental Health Centers Act until June 30, 1974.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Community Mental Health Centers Act to extend for 1 fiscal year the programs of assistance under that act.
